anticorruption-text: Applications are open for trainee-researcher enrollment in basic doctoral studies.
Opposition: Countering the Legalization of Criminal Proceeds and Terrorism Financing
Opposition-text: Applications are open for trainee-researcher enrollment in basic doctoral studies.
enforcement: Law Enforcement Academy of the Republic of Uzbekistan
about-center-text: Our website is a modern information platform dedicated to combating corruption and the legalization of criminal proceeds. It is designed to raise awareness among citizens, public servants, researchers, and students by providing access to a comprehensive knowledge base, analytical materials, and educational resources. The site integrates national and international expertise, offering convenient tools for studying advanced practices and modern approaches. Our goal is to provide users not only with quality materials but also with convenient access to the information necessary for professional development and the strengthening of legal culture.
InformationDatabases1: The main website of the National Library of Uzbekistan named after Alisher Navoi. Provides access to electronic resources, information about library services, events, and projects.
InformationDatabases2: Electronic dissertation library. A platform for searching and accessing scientific works defended in Uzbekistan.
InformationDatabases3: Catalog of rare and unique editions. A specialized resource for researchers and professionals interested in historical materials.
InformationDatabases4: A platform for scanning and accessing library materials through QR codes. A convenient tool for quick information retrieval.
InformationDatabases5: Electronic archive of periodicals. Allows viewing newspapers, magazines, and other publications in digital format.
sectionText: Countering the legalization of criminal proceeds ...
aboutTestText1: We create educational programs and materials for citizens, public officials, researchers, and students. These programs aim to deepen knowledge in combating corruption and studying national and international experiences.
aboutTest2: Creating and supporting an electronic database
aboutTestText2: The center manages an electronic database containing information on achievements, scientific developments, methodological materials, and domestic and foreign anti-corruption practices.
aboutTestText3: We provide users access to extensive information resources, including electronic libraries, analytical reports, legislative databases, and educational materials.
aboutTestText4: The introduction of modern digital technologies allows us to modernize the process of data collection, processing, and provision, as well as improve the quality and efficiency of services.
aboutTestText5: We develop partnerships with international organizations, participate in experience exchange and joint initiatives, and promote best global practices.
aboutGoal1: Creating an effective knowledge enhancement system
aboutGoalText1: Our goal is to provide citizens and specialists at all levels with access to educational materials necessary for effective anti-corruption efforts.
aboutGoal2: Developing a scientific and educational base
aboutGoalText2: We strive to integrate scientific research and development into the educational process, contributing to the training of qualified specialists.
aboutGoal3: Integration into the global information environment
aboutGoalText3: The introduction of digital technologies allows us to ensure international accessibility and long-term preservation of our resources.
aboutGoalText4: We work on forming a culture of integrity and fairness using the latest approaches to training and informing.
aboutGoalText5: Combating corruption and the legalization of criminal proceeds is the foundation for creating a favorable economic, social, and legal environment.
